entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-05-08
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Perf regression: kestrel-encoded-url #61841
  • [dnceng-bot] Branch `aspnetcore/release/8.0` can't be merged to Azdo internal branch #61839
  • [openapi] specific ProducesResponseType's SchemaReferenceId(name) by ProducesResponseTypeAttribute #61837

Closed

  • Perf regression: ApiCrudListProducts #61816
  • Perf improvement: tls-handshakes-kestrel #61835
  • Perf regression: fortunes_dapper #61836
  • MemoryOutputCacheStore doesn't respect "reason" for eviction and deletes tags erroneously #61524
  • .NET 9 causes CryptographicException when Kestrel loads a certificate from a PFX file #59300
  • aspnetcore-browser-refresh.js injected into JSON content #61838

PullRequests

Created

  • Introduce -productBuild and -sourceBuild switches #61840
    area-infrastructure

Merged

  • [release/8.0] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `52204f7` to `04ee1b4` #61761
    area-infrastructure, pending-ci-rerun, 8.0.17
  • Associate tagged keys with entries so replacements are not evicted #61529
    area-infrastructure, community-contribution, 10.0-preview5
  • [release/9.0] Forwarded Headers Middleware: Ignore XForwardedHeaders from Unknown Proxy #61622
    Servicing-approved, area-middleware, 9.0.6
  • [Blazor] Prepare for custom cache removal #61666
    area-blazor, feature-blazor-wasm, 10.0-preview5
  • [release/8.0] Forwarded Headers Middleware: Ignore XForwardedHeaders from Unknown Proxy #61623
    Servicing-approved, area-middleware, 8.0.17
  • [release/9.0] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `52204f7` to `04ee1b4` #61762
    area-infrastructure, 9.0.6
  • [main] Source code updates from dotnet/dotnet #61834
    area-infrastructure, Type: Dependency Update :arrow_up_small:, 10.0-preview5
  • [main] (deps): Bump dotnet/arcade from 11c848003df85813f4821fec2d43290fd4ca8594 to 43abe63bfc701d34e6599490a557a74710693410 #61771
    area-infrastructure, 10.0-preview5
  • Update milestones for June #61833
    area-infrastructure, 10.0-preview5
  • Update branding to 8.0.17 #61830
    8.0.16

Updated

  • Fixed devtools url used for debug with chrome and edge #61813
    area-blazor, community-contribution
  • Update helix references #61755
    area-infrastructure
  • InvalidOperationException when decompressed data exceeds request body size limit #61812
    community-contribution, area-middleware

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-05-08
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • NAOT; error when trying to run precompile queries step - "The build host could not be found" #36055
  • VoucherId2 is being referenced in the query but does not exist in the model or database #36054
  • _migrationsAssemblyObject is missing from RelationalOptionsExtension copy constructor #36053
  • Primitive collections don't support ChangingAndChangedNotifications ChangeTrackingStrategy #36052
  • Constraint names we generate by convention don't check for duplicates with explicitly generated constraint names #36049

Closed

  • `DbContext.Database.EnsureCreated();` hits `System.Net.Sockets.SocketException` #35970
  • Add a bool setting that, when true, makes logged query text directly runnable in a query tool #36050
  • `AlterColumn` to make a column nullable doesn't work if `oldType` is set #35860
  • System.InvalidOperationException: The ConnectionString property has not been initialized. #35936
  • Tooling to understand which entities get tracked #36042

PullRequests

Created

  • Merge release/9.0 to release/9.0-staging #36051

Merged

  • [main] Source code updates from dotnet/dotnet #36048
  • Merge branch 'release/8.0' =>'release/8.0-staging' #36047
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0' => 'release/9.0' #35927

Updated

  • Named query filters #36028
  • Add change tracking support for complex collections #35962
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/9.0' => 'main' #35932

entry.title: dotnet/installer - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-05-08
entry.content:
PullRequests

Created

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.1xx' => 'release/8.0.3xx' #20419

Merged

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.3xx' => 'release/8.0.4xx' #20418
  • Update branding to 8.0.117 #20415
  • Update branding to 8.0.313 #20416
  • Update branding to 8.0.410 #20417

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-05-08
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • SK Test Issue [Ignore] #29404
  • [CV2] LineBreakModeInCarouselViewShouldWork #29402
    .NET 9 Servicing
  • [IOS] HybridWebView can't display an iFrame #29396
  • Tapping on Shell's Tab item navigates back to the root page of the Tab on iOS #29395
  • Ellipse Transparency Not Rendered When Drawing Arc Inside the Ellipse Using GraphicsView on Android #29394
  • [iOS] IsSwipeEnabled Not Working on CarouselView (CV2) #29391
  • [iOS] Horizontal Scroll Bar Not Visible on CarouselView (CV2) #29390
  • SIGSEGV on Android 5.1.1 (now with repo) #29389

Closed

  • [Testing] Write Tests for Fix NullReferenceException in PaintExtensions.IsSolid on Android #28116 #28198
    .NET 9 SR8
  • Re-enabled Android UITests #28640
    .NET 9 SR7
  • [Testing] Reenable flaky UI test TextInEditorShouldScroll #29025
    .NET 9 SR7
  • Footer Not Displayed at the Bottom When EmptyView is Active in CV2 #28604
    .NET 9 SR7
  • On iOS GestureRecognizers don't work on Span in a Label, which doesn't get IsVisible (=true) update from its parent #28949
    .NET 9 SR7
  • Global xmlns in template #28846
    .NET 10 Planning
  • [Android] CollectionView Header and Footer Do Not Align with Horizontal ItemsLayout When EmptyView is Displayed #28622
    .NET 9 SR7
  • The warning of XLS1111 appears once open MAUI App file Resources\Styles\Styles.xaml #29218
    .NET 9 SR7
  • Bug in ICanvas.GetStringSize when called with default font #20419
    .NET 9 SR7
  • CarouselView IsSwipeEnabled=False Prevents Visual Navigation on Windows #29216
    .NET 9 SR7
  • [Testing] Crash popping FlyoutPage #21206
    .NET 9 SR7
  • TJ Test Issue #3 [Ignore] #29104
    Triaged
  • [REGRESSION, 9.0.60 Android] Many labels are of wrong size #28928
    .NET 9 SR7
  • x:Static Binding StringFormat not working in release #29238
  • iOS app doesn't remember user data after app is restarted #29201
  • Android Orphan Overlay Leading to App Freeze #29227
  • iOS Share.Default.RequestAsync does not display UIActivityViewController #29257

PullRequests

Created

  • [release/10.0.1xx-preview4] Revert "Remove InternalsVisibleTo for Toolkit" #29403
    .NET 10.0-preview4

  • [iOS] Fixed the Items are not displaying in CarouselView 2 #29397
    platform/iOS 🍎, area-controls-collectionview, community ✨, partner/syncfusion

    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area-testing

    area-drawing, community ✨, partner/syncfusion

Merged

  • [ci] Push metadata rollbacks #29401
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area-infrastructure, area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • Setup Stage for Validating CarouselView2 #29283
  • Update Versions.props for 9.0.70 versioning #29407

  • [iOS] Fix CarouselView proper bounce-back behavior when Loop=false #29318
    platform/iOS 🍎, area-controls-collectionview, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [C] Fix typo #29379
    .NET 9 SR7
  • [Android] - Fix inconsistent footer scrolling when EmptyView is a string in CollectionView #29381
    platform/android 🤖, area-controls-collectionview, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [Testing] Fix for UITest Catalyst screenshot dimension inconsistency and image cropping issue #29204
    area-testing, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [Windows] Fixed the color not being applied to the Expand/Collapse Chevron icon #29140
    platform/windows 🪟, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • Revert "Remove InternalsVisibleTo for Toolkit" #29321
    p/0, .NET 10.0-preview4
  • [2025/05/03] Staging - In Flight Branch #28486
    area-infrastructure, .NET 9 Servicing
  • [2025/05/12] Candidate - In Flight Branch #29335
  • [Testing] Fix for flaky UITests in CI that occasionally fail - 10 #29360
    area-testing, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [release/9.0.1xx-sr6] [maui-release] Use DevDiv/Xamarin.yaml-templates #29398
    area-infrastructure, .NET 9 SR6.1
  • [maui-release] Use DevDiv/Xamarin.yaml-templates #29385

Updated

  • [iOS] Trigger OnNavigatedTo method when hide the nav bar and using sw… #28694
    area-navigation, platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, .NET 9 Servicing

    area-controls-shell, community ✨, partner/syncfusion, .NET 9 Servicing
  • [Android] Overriding back button functionality with OnBackButtonPressed returning false in a modally pushed page causes stack overflow - fix #28812

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-05-08
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Record equality comparison not invoking property getter results in absurd outcomes when `field ??=` is used #78518
  • `new Type.$$` inserts unwanted parens #78515
  • SyntaxFactory.ParseCompilationUnit drops parse options #78510
  • Spread operation throws exception in .NET 9 #78506
  • Rosyln error CS9036 not described #78503

Closed

  • Dictionary expressions: extend support for key-value pairs to non-dictionary collections of `KeyValuePair<K, V>` #77871
    Next
  • EnC: detect changes in code that only runs once and need to force restart #77949
  • 'Add null check' should preffer `ArgumentNullException.ThrowIfNull` when it is available #78504
  • IDE0060 shows a warning for extension methods #78502
  • Spread operation throws exception in .NET 9 #78505
  • Assert in nullable state tracking #78386
  • [Automated] PRs inserted in VS build main-10607.40 #78501

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix information logs getting logged as debug in VSCode #78522
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Switch to non-scouting queue to unblock CI #78521
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Gracefully handle span mapping failing #78520
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Introduce -productBuild and -sourceBuild switches #78519
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Hot Reload: Handle document deletes #78516
    Area-Interactive, untriaged, VSCode
  • Fix go to definition for conversions on invalid constructor overloads #78514
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged
  • Switch to simple primary constructors for several DI types. #78513
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Extensions: handle extensions in VB SymbolDisplay #78512
    Area-Compilers, Feature - Extension Everything, untriaged
  • [release/dev17.14] Use a project reference for M.CA.AnalyzerUtilities #78511
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Fix crash in 'introduce variable' on top-level statements #78507
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged, VSCode

Merged

  • Merge main to runtime async branch #78517
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Needs API Review, VSCode
  • Delay loading of CodeRefactoringProvider's till absolutely needed #78495
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • PooledObjects cleanup #78382
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Publish symbols manually to internal feeds for PR validation #77088
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next
  • Dictionary expressions: extend support for key-value pairs to non-dictionary collections of `KeyValuePair<K, V>` #78274
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Feature - Dictionary Expressions
  • Exclude VS.ExternalAPIs.Roslyn.Package from source-build #78509
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next
  • Onboard the GitHub Action based Issue-Labeler #78426
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next
  • Use a project reference for M.CA.AnalyzerUtilities #78500
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next
  • Use lazy initialization for members in CodeFixService #78484
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Targeted perf changes to CommandLineParser #78446
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Add syntax highlighting of ignored directives #78458
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, Feature - Ignored Directives, Next
  • Fix unexpected conditional state in nullable analysis of conditional access #78439
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Merge EditorFeatures.Wpf entirely into EditorFeatures #78494
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Needs API Review, Next

Updated

  • Extensions: only count extensions for determining identifier #78523
    Area-Compilers, Feature - Extension Everything, untriaged
  • Don't unnecessarily create a document when only the document state is needed #78463
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Support consumption of unary extension operators. #78499
    Area-Compilers, Feature - Extension Everything, untriaged
  • Extensions: validate pattern-based constructs #78480
    Area-Compilers, Feature - Extension Everything, untriaged
  • Add support for FieldRva to EnC delta #78033
    Area-Interactive, untriaged, Needs API Review, VSCode, Feature - String Literals in Data Section as UTF8
  • Extensions: analyzer actions #78319
    Area-Compilers, Feature - Extension Everything, untriaged
  • Implement PDG.WithProjectsRemoved #78428
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Support interpolated string handlers in extension blocks #78425
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Unset CompilerType from Csc #78483
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • File based programs IDE support #78488
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, VSCode
  • Backport copilot text change analysis to 17.14 #78498
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Move to the platform's implementation of the BackgroundWorkIndicator service. #78473
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Fix unreachable code detection for throw statements and blocks #78490
    Area-Compilers, Blocked, Community, untriaged, VSCode
  • Collection arguments: binding for interface target types #78436
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Feature - Dictionary Expressions
  • Reduce duplicated FileUtilities.GetFileTimeStamp calls #78321
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • A bit of cleanup to StopWatchingReference's code to help diagnose an issue #78394
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Selectively persist the commandline to temporary storage #78441
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Update SolutionState._lazyFilePathToRelatedDocumentIds if GetFirstRelatedDocumentId ends up needing to do a full solution search. #78475
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode

entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-05-08
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Performance regression with regions-based GC when LOH has many short-lived allocations #115411
  • [9.0] WASM: Precompiling failed for C:\...\*.dll with exit code -1073741819 #115409
  • List of `libicu` versions in Debian DEPS file needs occasional updates #115407
  • Natvis equivalent debugging helpers for LLDB #115406
    Future
  • android-arm Release AllSubsets_Mono sometimes crashes for System.Runtime.Tests #115404
  • [API Proposal]: BitArray.AsBytes() #115400
    10.0.0
  • Enable Analyzers when building source-only #115397
    10.0.0
  • Bug when viewing documentation panel for `nint/nuint.MaxValue/MinValue` #115392
  • [API Proposal]: CborReader - Provide a mechanism to read the length of Strings #115390
  • System.Data.Odbc - SQLLEN does not handle -1 #115389

Closed

  • Invalid method is chosen by runtime as an interface implementation in presence of Default Interface Methods #43340
  • Need a better solution for decimal range validation #43749
  • System.Security.Cryptography.Tests crash on Alpine3.21 x64 #115357
  • System.Globalization.Tests.IdnMappingIdnaConformanceTests failing on Windows #115006
    10.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Remove of Ymm embedded rounding from Avx10.2 #115060
  • Vector128.WithElement codegen regression in .NET 9.0 #108197
    10.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Getting the positive remainder (Mod) when dividing a number by another #65408
    Future
  • INumber<TSelf> shouldn't inherit IUnaryNegationOperators<TSelf, TSelf>. #57307
    Future
  • Test failure: JIT/opt/InstructionCombining/Mvn/Mvn.cmd #115174
    10.0.0
  • System.InvalidProgramException on ARM64 in .NET 9 #111094
  • Crash in Mono when calling default method on generic interface (DIM) due to uninitialized vtable slot #113958
  • Implementations of Double.ExpM1, Double.LogP1 & co are not correct for arguments close to 0 (reminder) #115399
  • Nested class definition with same name fails serialization with System.Text.Json in source generation mode #115398
  • BlockingCollection.Take should throw a dedicated exception after CompleteAdding #115394
  • .Net 8 json code generator doen't work with Controllers #115377
  • Remove uses of `_PREFAST_` and `_PREFIX_` defines in VM #115305
    Future

PullRequests

Created

  • Add Azure Linux to regular CI #115415
    needs-area-label
  • [8.0] Fix line endings #115414
  • [9.0] Fix line endings #115413
  • Add UrlFormat to PQC Experimental attribute #115412
    area-System.Security, 10.0.0
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0' => 'release/8.0-staging' #115410
  • Consolidate QueryPerformanceCounter usages to minipal/time.h #115408
    area-PAL-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Reduce spin-waiting in the thread pool on Arm processors #115402
    area-System.Threading, 10.0.0
  • [main] Source code updates from dotnet/dotnet #115395
    area-codeflow
  • [WIP] Interpreter P/Invoke support #115393
    area-VM-coreclr
  • JIT: escape analysis for object fields #115388
    area-CodeGen-coreclr

Merged

  • Fix issues are stackwalking, and viewing Exception stack walks in the debugger #115405
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Fix incorrect codemanager implementation on x86 #115391
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, 10.0.0
  • [release/8.0-staging] Add support for more libicu versions #115378
    Servicing-approved, 8.0.x
  • [release/9.0-staging] Add support for more libicu versions #115376
    Servicing-approved, 9.0.x
  • Update branding to 8.0.17 #115384
    Servicing-approved
  • Update branding to 9.0.6 #115385
    Servicing-approved
  • Remove ymm embedded rounding from AVX10.2 #115235
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, breaking-change, new-api-needs-documentation, needs-breaking-change-doc-created, community-contribution
  • Vector128.WithElement codegen regression in .NET 9.0 #115348
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [Mono]: Fix generic interface non-virtual method vt_slot issue in build_imt_slots. #115306
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • [LoongArch64] Add variable lifetime update for GT_STOREIND for LoongArch64 porting from upstream's #46206 #114988
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-loongarch64
  • update netcoreapp3.0 to NetCoreAppCurrent in test #115373
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, community-contribution
  • Interpreter GC info stage 3: Report locals to the GC #114469
    area-VM-coreclr, area-CodeGen-Interpreter-coreclr
  • Disable stacks on Debugger IPC events #114585
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, 10.0.0
  • Remove `_PREFAST_` and `_PREFIX_` #115355
    area-VM-coreclr, 10.0.0
  • [release/9.0-staging] JIT: revised fix for fp division issue in profile synthesis #115026
    Servicing-approved, area-CodeGen-coreclr, 9.0.6

Updated

  • Signed CMS for SLH-DSA #115310
    area-System.Security, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Share implementation of ComWrappers between CoreCLR and NativeAOT #113907
    tenet-performance, area-Interop-coreclr
  • Target `netstandard2.1` where doing so is advantageous #115314
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, community-contribution
  • Improve Math.BigMul to fix Decimal compare perf regression #115182
    area-System.Runtime, community-contribution
  • Add custom exception handlers to generated COM wrappers #114828
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Implementation for `UnsafeAccessorTypeAttribute` #114881
    area-System.Runtime.CompilerServices, new-api-needs-documentation, 10.0.0
  • Write barrier without any RWX pages #114982
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Make the dotnet/runtime official build an assetless build #115311
    NO-MERGE, area-Infrastructure, 10.0.0
  • Remove always searching executable directory for native libraries in single-file applications #115236
    breaking-change, area-Single-File, needs-breaking-change-doc-created, 10.0.0
  • Tar: Refine GNU timestamp handling #115211
    area-System.Formats.Tar
  • [wasm][aot] Optimize 64 bit const shuffles. Otherwise prefer vector swizzle. #115351
    area-Codegen-LLVM-mono
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 2705157 #115228
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, linkable-framework
  • Switch remaining x64 queues to AL3 #115387
    area-Infrastructure
  • Improve startup perf by avoiding JIT when invoking well-known signatures #115345
    area-System.Reflection, tenet-performance, 10.0.0
  • [RISC-V] Introduce Zbs #115335
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • Refactor Sequential/Explicit layout to happen in the same phase where we do Auto layout #113454
    area-VM-coreclr, 10.0.0
  • [release/9.0-staging] [STJ] Account for F# CompilationMappingAttribute now supporting multiple declarations. #115076
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Text.Json, 9.0.6
  • [release/8.0-staging] [STJ] Account for F# CompilationMappingAttribute now supporting multiple declarations. #115077
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Text.Json, 8.0.17
  • [release/9.0-staging] Fix crash during Async Break when APC and CET are enabled #114932
    Servicing-approved, area-VM-coreclr, 9.0.6
  • [browser] Remove custom cache #114901
    NO-MERGE, arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-browser, 10.0.0
  • Enable SVE2 instruction set detection for ARM64 #115117
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arm-sve
  • Unmasking EGPRs in register allocator #114867
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [wasm][jiterp] Implement i64 jiterp shuffle and simplify logic #115344
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono, 10.0.0
  • Share allocation helpers between CoreCLR and NativeAOT #115339
    NO-REVIEW, area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [release/9.0] Fix edge cases in Tarjan GC bridge (Android) #114682
    NO-MERGE, Servicing-approved, os-android, area-GC-mono, community-contribution, 9.0.6
  • [WIP] Interpreter to JIT/AOT calls #115375
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-CodeGen-Interpreter-coreclr, 10.0.0
  • [DRAFT] try enabling regions on Mac again #115251
    NO-MERGE, area-GC-coreclr

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-05-08
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Dotnet new "Add project to solution" postAction can not find slnx files #48878
  • `dotnet format` support for excluding specific subcommands with --skip in dotnet format #48871
  • `dotnet tool` with WSL #48870
  • .net framework need to give customer more granular control on retry config to achieve higher resiliency and compatibility #48869
  • [dnceng-bot] Branch `sdk/release/9.0.3xx` can't be merged to Azdo internal branch #48866
  • [dnceng-bot] Branch `sdk/release/9.0.2xx` can't be merged to Azdo internal branch #48865
  • [dnceng-bot] Branch `sdk/release/9.0.1xx` can't be merged to Azdo internal branch #48864

Closed

  • We need a better doc on creating dev environments on Arm64 machines #22963
    Discussion

PullRequests

Created

  • Slnx should now be found when using the DotnetSlnPostAction #48879
  • [release/9.0.1xx] Fix path to tool settings file in build #48877
  • Skip splitting for paths Fixes #48794 #48874
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.4xx' => 'release/9.0.1xx' #48867
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.3xx' => 'release/8.0.4xx' #48862
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/9.0.2xx' => 'release/9.0.3xx' #48856

Merged

  • MSBuild fix for Csc task mismatch #48876
  • Update decouple-vs-and-net-sdk.md #48844
  • [main] Source code updates from dotnet/dotnet #48855
    Area-CodeFlow
  • Update branding to 8.0.117 #48847
  • Upgrade Issue-Labeler to v2.0.0 #48796
  • Update branding to 8.0.410 #48849
  • Update branding to 8.0.313 #48848
  • [HotReloadAgent] Update `MetadataUpdateHandlerInvoker` to be nullable friendly #48838
  • Update branding to 9.0.107 #48850
  • Update branding to 9.0.205 #48851
  • Update branding to 9.0.301 #48852

Updated

  • sln-add: --include-references when adding a project #48815
    Area-CLI
  • Support multiple files in file-based programs #48782
    Area-run-file
  • Add file-based program API for use by IDE #48749
    Area-run-file
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/9.0.3xx' => 'main' #48775
  • Ensure file-based program artifacts are restricted to the current user #48813
    Area-run-file
  • Prefer compiler toolset package if installed over the default `RoslynCompilerType=Core` logic #48837
  • Enable container test execution #48763
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Reenable CheckTargetFrameworkDisplayName test #48471
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
